title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. F, ch. III, pt. 205 - Fire Mobilization And Mutual Aid Plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. F, ch. III, pt. 205 - Fire Mobilization And Mutual Aid Plan

State Regulations
§ 205.1 - Definition of mutual aid
§ 205.2 - Purposes
§ 205.3 - Organization of the division of safety for activation of the state fire mobilization and mutual aid plan
§ 205.4 - Composition of the state fire mobilization and mutual aid plan
§ 205.5 - Procedure for admission of county fire mutual aid plans in the state fire mobilization and mutual aid plan
§ 205.6 - Authority of the state division of safety
§ 205.7 - Identification of a fire mobilization and mutual aid zone
§ 205.8 - Regional fire administrators and their duties
§ 205.9 - Activation of the state fire mobilization and mutual aid plan
§ 205.10 - Authority of regional fire administrator
§ 205.11 - Identification of regional fire administrator
§ 205.12 - Standard thread for fire service use in the State of New York

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. F, ch. III, pt. 205

Statutory authority: General Municipal Law, §209-e

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
